name: Aurum (TheRealUnderdog)
description:
You're a test subject that's trapped in a closed facility named Stabilis that works on breaking laws of gravity! Those powers were originally yours and you have to get it back! Find your way through and defeat your nemesis!

(Controls) - WASD to Move, SPACE for Jump and LEFT SHIFT to Run
                        -  You can slide and crouch by pressing LEFT Control
                        - Press TAB to switch between your weapon and your parkour mode

Sound designer - Darius Gourdine https://dgourdine1.wixsite.com/dariusbgaudio
Music - Paul E. Messier https://hollow-wanderer.itch.io/
Textures - https://ambientcg.com/

Source - https://github.com/theRealUnd3rdog/Aurum-Source
